div.p: We are a community based open source project and we really welcome and value your Contributions. We have various ways of getting help via the or .
Here are a few tips to help us to help you

ul.li: which version of ActiveMQ are you using? (and if you are using a SNAPSHOT, which date?)
are you using queues or topics and are you using persistent or non persistent messaging?

details of your environment can help too such as
operating system
JVM version (1.6, 1.5, or 1.4)
application server; spring, tomcat, J2EE etc?
remember you can always get full commercial support if you want a dedicated support team.
